### Data
-->

```{r, data, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
load("./red_and_black_220823_data.RData")
class_roll0823 <- class_roll[, -2]
nrow(class_roll0823)
class_roll <- read_excel("../data/class_roll220902.xlsx",
                         range = "B1:G1083",
                         col_names = TRUE,
                         col_types = "text")
nrow(class_roll)
names(class_roll) <- 
  c("dept", "id", "name", "status", "email", "cell_no")
class_roll <- data.frame(class_roll)
class_roll$status <- 
  ifelse(is.na(class_roll$status), "휴학", class_roll$status)
str(class_roll)
class_roll$group <- 
  class_roll0823$group[match(class_roll$id, class_roll0823$id)]
str(class_roll)
```

### 8월 23일자 출석부에만 나오는 사람들의 분포

```{r, echo = FALSE}
id_out <- setdiff(class_roll0823$id, class_roll$id)
id_new <- setdiff(class_roll$id, class_roll0823$id)
N_new <- length(id_new)
id_stay <- setdiff(class_roll0823$id, id_out)
class_roll0823[class_roll0823$id %in% id_out, c("id", "group")] %>%
  pander
class_roll0823$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0823$id %in% id_out) %>%
  table %>%
  pander
N_stay <- class_roll0823$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0823$id %in% id_stay) %>%
  length
red_stay <- class_roll0823$group %>%
  `[`(class_roll0823$id %in% id_stay) %>%
  table %>%
  `[`(1) %>%
  unname
N <- nrow(class_roll)
red_new <- floor((N - 2 * red_stay) / 2)
```

### 8월 23일 출석부에도 나오는 사람들의 데이터 구조

```{r, echo = FALSE}
str(class_roll[class_roll$id %in% id_stay, ])
```

### 새로 들어온 사람에게만 랜덤화 적용

```{r, sub randomization, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
source("./RnB_v4.R")
M1 <- 2000001
M2 <- 3000000
Xsum <- sapply(M1:M2, red_and_black)
names(Xsum) <- M1:M2
Xsum %>%
  summary %>%
  round(2) 
Xsum %>%
  sd %>%
  round(2)
Xsum %>%
  `<=`(1) %>%
  which %>%
  `[`(Xsum, .) %>%
  round(2)
Xmin <- names(Xsum[which(Xsum == min(Xsum))])
Xmin
```

## Randomization

```{r, randomization}
# set.seed(Xmin)
set.seed(Xmin)
id_red <- sample(1:N_new, size = red_new)
class_roll[class_roll$id %in% id_new, "group"] <- 
  factor(ifelse(1:N_new %in% id_red, "Red", "Black"), levels = c("Red", "Black")) 
red_and_black(Xmin)
```

### 학번

```{r, id}
class_roll$id_2 <-
  class_roll$id %>%
  ifelse(. <= 2016, "2016", .)
tbl1 <- class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id_2 %>% substr(1, 4)) %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("2016 이전", 2017:2022)) 
tbl1 %>%
  pander
class_roll <- class_roll[, names(class_roll0823)]
X1min <- tbl1 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X1min
```

### 학번 홀짝

```{r, odd or even}
tbl2 <- class_roll$id %>%
  as.numeric %>%
  `%%`(2) %>%
  factor(levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("홀", "짝")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl2 %>%
  pander
X2min <- tbl2 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X2min
```

### 학적 상태

```{r, status}
tbl3 <- class_roll$status %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl3 %>%
  pander
X3min <- tbl3 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X3min
```

### e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail}
tbl4 <- class_roll$email %>%
  strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
  sapply("[", 2) %>%
  `==`("naver.com") %>%
  ifelse("네이버", "기타서비스") %>%
  factor(levels = c("네이버", "기타서비스")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl4 %>%
  pander
X4min <- tbl4 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X4min
```

### 전화번호의 분포

```{r, cell_no}
cut_label <- paste(paste0(0:9, "000"), paste0(0:9, "999"), 
                   sep = "~")
tbl5 <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 8, stop = 11) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric) %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl5 %>%
  pander
X5min <- tbl5 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X5min
```

### 성씨 분포

```{r, name}
f_name <- class_roll$name %>%
  substring(first = 1, last = 1) 
tbl6 <- f_name %>%
  `%in%`(c("김", "이", "박")) %>%
  ifelse(f_name, "기타") %>%
  factor(levels = c("김", "이", "박", "기타")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl6 %>%
  pander
X6min <- tbl6 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X6min
```

### Sum of Chi_Squares

```{r}
Xsum_min <- X1min + X2min + X3min + X4min + X5min + X6min
Xsum_min
```
